name: Jigsaw (2017)
description: \n                    Thirteen years ago on Halloween weekend--SAW and the character of JIGSAW introduced the world to a new face of horror.  For seven straight years \"If it's Halloween it must be SAW\" was a holiday tradition.  This October 27, Lionsgate and Twisted Pictures proudly present JIGSAW!  After a series of murders bearing all the markings of the Jigsaw killer, law enforcement find themselves chasing the ghost of a man dead for over a decade and embroiled in a new game that's only just begun. \n
